title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 814.10 - Space alterations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 814.10 - Space alterations

State Regulations
A governing authority proposing alterations to its physical
space utilized for chemical dependence services, including requests for
additional space, changes in space designations and/or other alterations, must
obtain prior written approval from OASAS no less than 60 days before
implementing the change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
814.10

Adopted

New

York State Register July 27, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 30, eff. 7/27/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
